title: Raiders on a Playoff Run & David Carr for the Steelers
itunes:title: Raiders on a Playoff Run & David Carr for the Steelers
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Handsome Hank and David Carr in Studio 66 to go around the league after most of the Week 16 games! David Carr and Handsome Hank tell Dave that nobody cares about his fantasy win (2:30) before they break down the Dolphins win (5:20). There are rumors that Jon Gruden wants to move on from Derek Carr and his brother has something to say about that. (5:35).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
